original_text: The Bible already said what would happen at a future time. It said that God would make the Gentiles right with himself, if they believed in him. God showed this good news to Abraham a long time before it happened. He said to Abraham, ‘I will bless people from all countries because of you.’
korean_text: 또 하나님이 이방을 믿음으로 말미암아 의로 정하실 것을 성경이 미리 알고 먼저 아브라함에게 복음을 전하되 모든 이방인이 너로 말미암아 복을 받으리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: what would happen at a future time
It said that God would make the Gentiles right
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이방인들을 의롭게 만드실 것이라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: God showed this good news to Abraham
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이 좋은 소식을 아브라함에게 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: a long time before it happened
'I will bless people from all countries
